Review.Titre: While customer service was A+..(before they freaked out) The drives are not
Review.Contenu: While customer service was A+, the drive sent reports 100% usage at less than a MB/s transfer rate. By far the worst drive I have ever used. 1/600th of the max possible speed is sad. I understand that 600Mbps is sequential perfect world performance, but I get better results on any other drive, and this is an SSHD! Dissapointed to say the leastUpdate* drive solutions emailed me begging for a better review, and tried to justify selling bad drives. If I bought a lemon car from a car dealership, I wouldn't blame the manufacturer I would blame the company that chose to sell faulty hardware.Then, they decided to publicly say my hardware is the problem, not the drive they sent. Even if I had a hardware problem, this drive does not perform. You are a STORAGE company. If the STORAGE you sell is faulty, it's your fault. My review originally reflected on both the drive and the company, and I said the company is solid. I change my mind. Any company this desperate for good reviews on failing performance is sad. I do not recommend this company, and I will not return the drive because I'm confident they would just sell it again to another buyer while claiming it is functional. Overall, stop begging for better reviews, it makes you look bad and has convinced me to never recommend them again to anyone.The reply from the company implied that the products they sell have nothing to do with their company. I disagree. For another comparison, imagine ordering a pizza and it's delivered burnt to a crisp, and the pizza place says "Well... Really you should be reviewing the flour from the company we bought from, it's not our fault it's bad!" I really don't care if your company doesn't have perfect reviews, you obviously are begging/possibly bribing for good reviews and that's a you problem. Stop bothering me. Tired of companies desperate to look good at any cost. Just check their reply(if they don't change it). They believe that they are independent of the services they provide, but that's not how the world works.Once again, you selling bad product DOES reflect badly on you, and it's really not my problem to make you look better than you are.

Review.Titre: Not what I ordered and rude service!
Review.Contenu: Their website showed I was ordering a 9.5 mm hard drive, but what I got was a 7 mm hard drive. Since the phone number to the company was NOT on the packing slip, I looked it up online and called about the problem. I was told that 9.5 mm thick hard drives stopped being made about two years ago and that the 7 mm hard drive I received would work fine. I let the customer service girl know that their website needed to be updated, since it showed a 9.5 mm size.  I let the girl know about some other problems with the order and from the way she responded to me, I could tell she thought my concerns were silly!  The other concerns were:  1. On the part of the invoice that was on the package and showed my mailing address - right under my name was my e-mail address and right under my mailing address, was my phone number! I don't appreciate my e-mail address and phone number being right there where the whole world can see them!!! It makes me think that this company is not being careful with my banking info either!!! I've never in my 56 years - had a company put my e-mail address and phone number right there on the package - where anybody can see them!!! (and I've ordered online a lot!) 2. The bubble wrap that my hard drive was in, was NOT taped at the ends!!! 3. Their phone number was NOT on the packing slip!!! Talk about NOT paying attention to detail! Well, these details have made up my mind to NOT order from them ever again! This was my FIRST AND LAST order with this company!!!

Review.Titre: Came with no screws and device wasn't firmly secured in packaging
Review.Contenu: For now, I'm giving the product I ordered three stars since I haven't installed the hard drive yet because it didn't come equipped with screws! I don't have any tiny screws laying around that will fit. So now I'll have to go on a wild goose chase to find anywhere that sells tiny screws before I can finally install and test the hard disk drive (hpdt68 DT-SATA2 4 TB 5900 RPM). Besides that, I do give Drive Solutions credit for the fast shipping. I was a little disappointed that the hard disk drive wasn't firmly secured inside the box it was shipped in so I hope the drive wasn't damaged. Of course, I won't know until I install the drive...once I find the tiny screws...a store that has them.

Review.Titre: Ordered drive but never received it
Review.Contenu: Ordered drive but never received it.  No shipping information either.   Emailed, no response.  Called 10 times during business hours but message says call back during business hours.  Never again.Update 11/8. I did get my drive. Lesley from Drive Solutions was very diligent and helpful to get me  my drive. She was very professional and took care of the problem.  The reason I didn’t get my drive originally was that it was shipped to the wrong address. That was not DriveSolutions fault.  However, if I would have gotten shipping information sent to me after the order, I would have been able to find this out sooner for myself. Secondly, after not receiving the drive or shipping, I did email twice and didn’t get a response.  And I did try to call many times during business hours, and the message always said call during business hours.  I got my drive thanks to Lesley.  I don’t like writing bad reviews, but I have to say, I don’t know if I would have ever gotten a response had I not done so.  Anyway, I’ll rate a little higher because of Lesley, but there were still issues getting hold of the company.

Not enough information about data transfer kits and drives. Your site tells me that my Dell Precision Desktop T3500 can use various SATA 3.5" drives, so I assume that's what's in my computer. But your one and only desktop data transfer kit says it transfers data using a USB connection to any 2.5" SATA drive. Not a 3.5" SATA drive. Why not?

Review.Titre: I don't order drives that often
Review.Contenu: I don't order drives that often, and I wish you had clearly stated "does not ship with drive caddy."  Other than that, it came fast (with standard shipping), it worked, and the price was okay.

Review.Titre: It worked pretty well but many updates…
Review.Contenu: It worked pretty well but many updates you have to install manually and they still haven't worked. Some of it my fault because it's an older desktop and haven't used it in many years.
Slow out of the gate - took way too long from the time I placed my order to the time it was shipped. Good selection of hard drives for my laptop and reasonable prices, though.
Well as navigation goes. The website is spot on. As shipping goes it says 2 to 3 day to get here. Still hasn’t showed up yet.

Review.Titre: Great Place to shop, decent experience
Review.Contenu: Good overall experience, but the online shopping experience needs some work.  Once the order is placed, there is really no follow up, no where on the site to check on the status of your order.  Only way to get any updates is to email them, but it usually takes a day or two to get any feedback.  Would be nice if you could check the status of your order on line.

Review.Titre: Good Service - Despite Hassles and extra cost
Review.Contenu: I had problems using their website with PayPal, but after switching to a credit card it all worked.  But then I found 3 emails from them for my order(s).  Did I have 1 or 3 drives ordered?  Had to call to check. Then HD arrived dead.  However a phone call got a quick shipment out to me of a new working drive and an RMA#. However I had to pay the $9 postage to ship the first defective drive back to them.

Review.Titre: Have a BIG selection of hard drives
Review.Contenu: Have a BIG selection of hard drives, but there is almost no helpful info available. I bought what I thought was a new hard drive for a laptop that I was given, whose hard drive had failed.It would not fit; I wrote to them and they wrote back saying I simply had to fit the drive into the old caddy - DUH, no one is THAT stupid (I hope).I wrote back asking if they could supply such, but got no response.I have since found a caddy AND CONNECTOR on ebay, which I HOPE will work.

I ordered a 160 GB Toshiba Hard Drive but I just received an 80GB Hitachi hard drive and charged the full amount.  I just went to the website and clicked on the 160 GB drive item again and got the same part number, so I did not make a mistake.  I will install this Hitachi drive soon and if it truly only is 80 GB than I will ask for some refund but have little hope for that (they did not return a phone call).  Maybe avoid this website.

Review.Titre: Excellent solid state drive, poor EZ Gig cloning software
Review.Contenu: The new laptop solid state hard drive proved to be excellent. But the EZ Gig software for cloning my Windows 7 system was problematic. After repeated failures tech support directed me to another cloning software product from another vendor which eventually worked.I'm very happy with the solid state hard drive but very disappointed in the cloning software.

Review.Titre: Hitachi Hard Drive a perfect fit
Review.Contenu: I hard to replace my laptop hard drive and came across the DriveSolutions.com site. I was impressed by the selection immediately and found what I needed by brand and even found one with a higher rpm rate than the original. I chose Hatachi because it was the original manufacturer of my old  SATA drive. Regular shipping took 5 days but the price made it worth it.

I easily ordered and subsequently bought a new hard drive for my laptop, which was listed as being compatible, but it was not. I tried calling about the issue, but the phone number they left in their auto-response email didn't even work. However, I was able to talk to someone by email and she was very helpful. I would rate higher if I could've spoken to someone by phone one of the several times I tried calling. Go email if you have questions.

I ordered my hard drive off the website. The one I received was not the same one I ordered. I seemed to be compatible with my computer, but I had a few questions about it before I installed it. I called, I had to leave a message for them to get back to me. No one ever called back. The customer service is definitely not up to par.

Review.Titre: Chart great but clone product a dud for a Mac
Review.Contenu: I bought my HD upgrade from your site because of the detailed chart on which disc works for which model of each computer/laptop. It gave me confidence I was buying a HD that would work.Also bought the EZ-UP-UNIVERSAL-B kit for cloning old disk to new. It had software for cloning on PC/Windows. I have a MacBook. For Mac it gave directions to use the Mac Disk Utility restore function. Directions were out of date (i.e., didn't work for current version of OS-X) and their tech support didn't help.

Review.Titre: If at first you do not succeed.........
Review.Contenu: I ordered a hard drive for a laptop and a "clone making" kit. Three days later I found a letter in my "spam" filter telling me that two days earlier my credit card had come back "not valid number". I tried for a half a day to call, but just sat "on hold" for an hour at a time.Finally, four days after the initial order, I ordered again. This time the hard drive and transfer kit was shipped. After I received it, every thing worked just fine. Laptop good as new.Glenn Heard

I have yet to receive a confirmation email after a week of ordering. I have found everything that I'm looking for, I just hope I get it. Once I get my products, my opinion might change, but as my header says, sitting on pin and needles.

Review.Titre: Never returned my phone calls or emails
Review.Contenu: I tried to contact customer support several times, via email and by leaving a phone message and you folks never got back to me -- very disappointing. On the other hand, excellent website and super prices. Quick delivery of my order

Review.Titre: Product works fine but shipping was very slow.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a replacement hard drive for my laptop as the original one was damaged.  Received the drive, installed it and reinstalled software.   Everything seems to be working perfect. My one and only issue is that when it came to the shipping selection.  There was no info as to where this product was being from, at least not that I could see, so I chose the cheapest method (FedEx Ground).  After FedEx picked up the package and sent me a tracking number I was able to see the item was being shipped from CA and would take a full week to get to me in NY.  Had I known where the product was being shipped from I would have chosen Priority Mail for a couple extra dollars.

Called several times to place a phone order but got a recording.I did manage to order online though.I believe you tried billing my Ralph (bro) twice for this order?(He paid with his CC not I.) The parts worked OK.

So far good, it's what I ordered. My only complaint would be with shipping. Paid extra for 2-3 day shipping. Received on day 5. I know it may be out of your hands, but the shipper (USPS) not honoring it. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Failure to ship per stated policy
Review.Contenu: Ordered items 24 May 2016 before 10 AM. Paid $16.50 for PRIORITY MAIL shipping in order to have items ( HDD and Memory Cards ) by the weekend. Shipping policy states orders before noon ship the same day.Received notice from USPS of items shipped on 31 May 2016, a FULL WEEK AFTER ORDER DATE ! Received items on 3 June 2016, a week after I needed them ! There was no communication from DriveSolutions as to out of stock or other reason for a delay. So I got FLEECED paying for 2-3 day shipping ( The Post Office met their obligation ) and Receiving GROUND SHIPPING TIMELINESS ! Products are installed and working fine BUT the SERVICE IS NOT AS ADVERTISED ! I WON'T BE ORDERING AGAIN as long as there is another option ! Thank You.

Ordered an SSD drive and an adapter.  SSD drive arrived but without the adapter.  Called, and they acknowledged the problem and immediately shipped the adapter.  However, they shipped the wrong adapter.
I received the SSHD and unfortunately it didn't work. But i was assured that i will be receiving a new SSHD so when i get it, i will update and tell in-depth about the experience. Thank You.
I ordered a hard drive about a week ago but have not heard anything; no tracking no or confirmation of order from driversolutions; just that the order has been placed from Paypal.

The Good: I had ordered two disk drives. Their prices were a bit higher than another distributor but the free shipping more than compensated for the difference. The order was placed on backorder and were shipped within 3 working days. Overall the time between ordering and receipt was less than a week. Pretty good. The Bad: Our SPAM filter uses "greylisting" to block unwanted email. It does this by delaying receipt of senders not recognized. Normal senders resend withing a couple of minutes; spam senders do not. DriveSolutions' mail server acted like a spammer and never attempted to resend the confirmation email. The Ugly: I called DriveSolutions 4 times leaving a message each time requesting confirmation of the order. No response. The 5th time I got lucky and connected with a human who very polite and helpful.

Review.Titre: good products but delivery takes too long
Review.Contenu: have ordered before and have been happy w/ products. this time its been a week & I am still waiting for my hard drive. might be tempted to use Amazon next time!

I had used the web site to find a hard drive for my laptop not knowing the specifics of the hard drive only my laptop. With what I found on the help find a hard drive, I ordered the drive. Ordering and delivery was exceptional. When I tried to install the drive, I found that the connector was the wrong type. I needed a PATA 44 pin connector and what I received was a SATA connector. I contacted Sales/Customer Service via E-Mail for a RMA and help in getting the hard drive I needed for my laptop. It’s now been 72 hrs later and I still have not heard from either of them for an RMA or suggestion on a hard drive, I'm a bit disturbed. I will attempt to call them to try and speed my request. I did receive an automated response that said it might be up to 48 hrs for a response, other than that the only other thing I have received was this “Voice your opinion” which I am doing.

Review.Titre: I got the wrong hard drive
Review.Contenu: I got the wrong hard drive, I ordered 750 gb and got 1 TB.

Review.Titre: good product did not get the shipping i ordered took almost a week when ordered 1 to 3 day
Review.Contenu: the  product was good and came packed to achieve max protection from damage However the shipping did not live up to what i paid for  All in all  ok
The website indicated that an email will be sent when the package is being shipped. Did not receive the package but the package was received.

Review.Titre: Mixed billing and shipping postal codes
Review.Contenu: When I ordered my new HDD Drive Solutions emailed me an order confirmation email where all the information was correct. What they didn't do was forward the information correctly to the deliverer; they gave the deliverer the postal code for my shipping address instead of my delivery address and I didn't catch it until the day of delivery. My order, which had 2 day delivery didn't come until 5 days later (one of which was a Sunday, so that's a bit forgivable). If you do order from them make sure that all your information is correct on the deliverer themselves or you may run into the same problem I did.Tl;Dr the hard drive was ok, the delivery was not.Edit: A representative got back to me, apologized for the mistake, and offered a refund for the delivery. I do appreciate that Drive Solutions refunded me my delivery charge, but it's frustrating all the extra time I had to both wait for the delivery and to deal with this afterwards. They did all they could to make things right and, again, I appreciate what they did.
Hard drive I ordered came as requested but there was no ntification of shipping email as advertised.  Overall good.

Review.Titre: Paid for next business day delivery
Review.Contenu: Paid for next business day delivery, it took 2 days.  Asked for a partial refund with no response.
I did not receive my drive due to Fedex returning my product back to your warehouse.

Review.Titre: Paypal portion of website did not work …
Review.Contenu: Paypal portion of website did not work properly.

Review.Titre: I have order a 7200 rpm hard drive they sent me a 5400 rpm
Review.Contenu: It was to complicated to return an re-order

Review.Titre: Delivery was good, follow-up questions were never answered.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a 2 TB SATA drive "compatible" with my wife's Dell Laptop when there were signs of imminent disk failure on December 21, 2014.  It arrived promptly a few days later.  Drive Solutions' FAQs told me that there was likely to be a small interposer between most laptops' drives and their disk interface itself.  That was a great help when I saw that it needed to be taken off the old drive and put onto the new one before installing the new drive. I had many questions about their software offering to help in migrating the data to the new drive, so I e-mailed Drive Solutions with them, but I immediately got a reply that advised me to phone them because it would take several days to get a response from their technical support team by e-mail.  It is now 16 days later and I STILL have not gotten an answer to my e-mail. That's not very good customer service. Also, their phone system SUCKS big-time! I could not get through after 3 work days of trying (about 50 times), so I started looking elsewhere for answers.  Eventually, I found the manufacturer of the gadget that Drive Solutions offered, and then found a number of choices from Apricorn including the full manuals for the Apricorn software and a hardware gadget which I eventually bought (one of the Apricorn offerings) and tried using it to migrate the data.  Nobody and nothing ever told me that the Apricorn product (interface, software and enclosure) could NOT handle a situation where even ONE bad sector existed on the source drive.  At least Apricorn DID answer their phone (on my FIRST try) and I got the lowdown on that problem but only after wasting 3 full days trying to make the product do what it was NOT going to ever do. I did eventually got all the content onto the replacement drive (another WEEK of time, gone) but only because I had a recent Windows "System Save" on an external hard drive, a Dell Recovery disk, an installable DVD with Dell's OEM version of Windows/7 and an up-to-date backup of ALL the data files on separate external hard drives. This is not for the faint-of-heart, but a data recovery vendor may not have the patience I did and, if they tried at all, would have cost MUCH more money that I eventually spent or just have said "too bad".
Had to modify the tray sent but it all worked out

Review.Titre: Easy drive search and ordering  process
Review.Contenu: Searching for the right HD upgrade for my laptop was easy. The ordering process was also easy and the price was great. Didn't give 5 stars due to not receiving an order confirmation email. Did get an order shipping notifcation email.

Review.Titre: Very organized, easy to find needed parts
Review.Contenu: Very organized, easy to find parts that match manufacturer brands, excellent packing, competitive pricing! However shipping charges are high and a bit slow shipping. Ordered part from Nov. 4th, received on Nov. 11st.Thank You, DriveSolutions.com

My only dissatisfaction with DriveSolutions is I find the automatic $12.00 shipping charge via UPS or USPS for two Dimm chips surprising. Does it really cost that amount to ship such tiny articles? Maybe so. I'll see if the actual shipping charge shows on the package when it arrives. If amount is that, OK. If not, why the extra amoumt?

Review.Titre: With your addition of extra layers of…
Review.Contenu: With your addition of extra layers of "paperwork", you havemade it more difficult to purchase hard drives. Other than that,I depend on your extensive inventory of hard drives when I need them.

Review.Titre: I think delivery could be a little…
Review.Contenu: I think delivery could be a little quickerOther wise okThese are bare drivesNo operating systemsA novice like myself could use some more advise

Review.Titre: I ordered a laptop hard drive
Review.Contenu: I ordered a laptop hard drive.  I then got an email saying my credit card had been declined, and showing all of the card info submitting to my bank.  Called my bank to ask why the charge had been declined.  Bank says the wrong cvv had been submitted with the order.  Phoned DriveSolutions.com to ask them to resubmit the charge and take care to give the correct cvv.  Did so by phone message because nobody picked up the phone.  It's been a over a week now, and there is no sign anybody reviewed the phone message or did anything in response.Update:  Lindsey in their customer service dept. phoned me.  All problems have been fully taken care of to my complete satisfaction.

Review.Titre: The product was exactly what I wanted…
Review.Contenu: The product was exactly what I wanted and delivered quickly. I did find the install instructions confusing and ended up using a Youtube video to walk me through it.

Review.Titre: Well they shipped me the wrong item but…
Review.Contenu: Well they shipped me the wrong item but they jumped right on it when I emailed them. The overnight-ed me the correct item at no additional cost and sent me a RMA label so I could return the incorrect drive to them at no cost to me. So far, the new drive is working just fine.

Review.Titre: The hard drive came on time and I…
Review.Contenu: The hard drive came on time and I managed to install it and so far it's working ok. I'm satisfied and the computer upgrade item seems to make my PC run a lot faster.

Review.Titre: I had a pleasant experience shopping…
Review.Contenu: I had a pleasant experience shopping with this site. I found what I needed and was able to purchase at a reasonable price with no hassle.

Review.Titre: I got my order in quick and timely…
Review.Contenu: I got my order in quick and timely manner. They contacted me to ensure my order was accurate since I did two separate transactions.

Review.Pseudo: Option, The best price service and quality product
Review.Contenu: The SSD is great! But it did not come with a mounting bracket when your site said it come with one. Which is a good thing since it provably would be the right one anyway.
Great price - great shipping time - only complaint is the packaging was a little 'homemade'...but it kept it safe!

Review.Titre: Your shipping time is much improved and…
Review.Contenu: Your shipping time is much improved and yourproduct is still reliable.
I ordered a drive, it came, I installed it, and so far it's working like a charm
Good substitute and help with transferring the data.
The order went well. Shipping seems to move very slowly.

Review.Titre: The drive is good,But fedex took a long…
Review.Contenu: The drive is good,But fedex took a long time to get it here.

Review.Titre: Exactly what I ordered and delivered on…
Review.Contenu: Exactly what I ordered and delivered on time

Review.Titre: YOUR SITE IS GREAT & THE PEOPLE I TALL TO , WERE VERY HELP FULL !!!
Review.Contenu: i HAVE NOT CLONE MY HARD DRIVE AS OF YET, THE CLONING DEVICE WOULD NOT WORK WITH THE HARD DRIVE I BOUGHT, UNLESS I PUT THE NEW HARD DRIVE IN MY LAP TOP AND HOOK UP MY OLD ONE TO THE DEVICE (NOT TO INSTRUCTION) I WANTED TO DO IT TO THE INSTRUCTION ON THE CD..   SO I CALLED THE PEAPLE THAT SHIP IT TO ME AND THERE GOING TO SEND ME A DIFERNT KIT. VERY EASY TO WORK WITH .         NICE PEOPLE          DANIEL MCBRIDE

I bought a hard dive from Drive Solutions for my Dell laptop computer a week ago. It has been working nicely well. What I like most was their fast shipping! I needed to use my computer and got the drive in two days, which saved my life. One thing is that their email response to customer inquiry is kind of slow. You may want to use phone instead.

I don't know what happened to their online ordering system but it did not process my order at all.  So after a couple of days I called to check and they confirmed no order was ever received, however, upon saying that, my order was taken over the phone in a very courteous professional manner that made dealing with them a pleasure.  My ordered item arrived within a couple days of placing my order. Very happy with their service.

Actually, DriveSolutions.com WAS great. It was the Sabrent external hard drive enclosure purchased to transfer my data that was funky. The enclosed directions were for an older OS than I have and when I called their customer support line a tech support guy - who couldn't have been less willing to help - suggested that I buy Carbon Copy Cloner which I did. So the process wasn't clearly defined but the hardware works well, arrived quickly, and was very affordable.

Review.Titre: Slick - easy, preemptive strike to avert an inevitable disc crash
Review.Contenu: Phoned sales to verify what I needed, ordered online, delivered on time via Fedex ground, hardware and software worked exactly as billed.  Some of my programs though installed, will require re-entering license keys...the only reason I gave this 4 instead of 5 stars.  Had I been warned about this minor on their site, I'd have been prepared for that surprise.  My new disk is bigger and faster and my laptop booted up fine after replacing the old hard drive with the new, cloned, one.

I liked that they Gave me options on hard drives. I purchased an upgrade from my previous broken one. Which arrived on time.  I mistyped my address and within 24 hrs they sent me an email confirming it's correctness. Only upset was I don't believe it takes 15 $ to send a small envelope through usps.

I ordered a new hard drive for my Macbook mid 2010. The drive was delivered quickly and packaged nicely. It was installed and the computer is back to new working great just like before. I am so glad I found Drive Solutions to bring my Mac back to life. My only problem was that I did not receive my tracking information.

The drives arrived in good condition and was compatible with my computer as per the site. Only complaint would be the slow processing time on DriveSolutions end. It was 5 day before they shipped the order out. Other than that everything is working great. Would recommend to first time drive buyers.

I received a new harddisc for my laptop and an install kit for it.It all worked as desired, and I am happy with the experienceThe only problem was that Drive Solutions did not email a tracking number to me.When I saw that PayPal had paid Drive Solutions, I sent them a flame saying, "Send me a tracking number or refund the PayPal payment and cancel the order.The next day, the package was on my porch. So, I will use Drive Solutions the next time I need a harddisc Regards......Charlie

Review.Titre: I normally shop here for all HDD and Memory Upgrades
Review.Contenu: ... but this time around, DriveSolutions.com was not up to date with the SSD's that are compatible with a MacBook Pro 17" (Early 2011) and in fact, did not list any SSDs at all.  Other World Computers (OWC.com) has been selling compatible SSDs for years now so it appears that DriveSolutions simply is not up to date when it comes to Apple Products and Upgrades. Despite this, DriveSolutions is always my number one choice for PC upgrades of which I have bought many products the past few years.

EZ Upgrade 3.0 for laptops is an  excellent product, however support not so great. got a 0xc0000225 error code. was told a fix would be available in three months.  I googled the error code and got the solution. The Master Boot Record was corrupt. Support should have known about this fix.

A useful website with all of the different hard drive options available for my specific computer.  Package came quickly with no delays.  Shipping seemed a little high for a tiny HDD; the shipping price could be improved.  I'd accept a slower and cheaper shipping option if it were available.

Review.Titre: Product = great; website = not so great
Review.Contenu: It took several attempts to get the online order actually placed (I would place the order in cart, but when I'd go to pay, it wouldn't be there or when I'd choose a shipping method it would empty my cart...even tried different browsers) and when it was finally completed, the confirmation email never came.  I could see that I paid for it by looking at my paypal statement and the new hard drive came in the expected amount of time...I guess I would have been happier if I had been able to confirm that my order had been received and shipped.

While the product worked as advertised, it took some delving into the help info on the disk to find that the Security chip in the Lenovo T61p BIOS needed to be disabled to run the clone.  I have been unable to get through to support to find out if the chip then needs to be re-enabled.

Review.Titre: Replacement HD for HP Pavilion Laptop
Review.Contenu: Needed a replacement drive for my HP Pavilion DV6.  Had just what I wanted at a fair price.  Was delivered unexpectedly fast.  Name brand HD that plugged right in.  I would buy from them again.  Am considering upgrading to a faster drive for my Lenovo and maybe some RAM.

Review.Titre: Driver was received on date promised, well packed and is now installed.
Review.Contenu: Only concern was I did not receive an Email notifying me that it had been shipped, consequently I contacted them to determine its whereabouts only  to have it delivered shortly afterwards.      Good service but unfortunately I had not been notified of the shipping.

I purchased a replacement HD for my Dell Inspiron 5000 after the original drive died. The DriveSolutions replacement drive installed and ran without incident; the quality of the product seems excellent, at least so far. But I could not give more than a 3 star rating simply because besides the receipt, there was not so much as one piece of support material contained in the package. A diagram; an explanation of setting up the drive - or any drive for that matter; a resource to go to for more in-depth help. Fortunately I had enough experience to install and set up the drive myself. And as I said, the drive is working just fine.

I am a novice in the tech world, but I found ordering what I needed very easy. Items were received in days. when I found out that I should not be transferring data, I called Drive Solutions and they accepted my return even though the package said not returnable if opened. Was very happy about this accommodation.  My only suggestion is really to the manufacturer of the data transfer part...should either answer their help line quickly or state on package that transferring data from a damaged hard drive is not recommended. This may seem elementary to most, but a movie like myself wanted confirmation.

Review.Titre: Order placed and paid for but so far no contact from Drivesolutions
Review.Contenu: The pruchase process and payment went fine, but I have not had a single email regarding the progress of my order which seems very strange. Normally I would expect a confirmation email. I hope to hear from them soon, but it has been nearly wo weeks! A bit concerned. UPDATE!Drivesolutions have since contacted me as a result of myTrustpilot comments and the order confirmation problem was due to emails not getting to me. They have assured me that the order is being processed, and I have no reason to doubt them.TRUSTPILOT would seem to be working and DriveSolutions do take the feedback seriuosly. Well done.

Review.Titre: Install was smooth, WIndow XP did not like drive
Review.Contenu: Installation in my ThinkPad T43 went very smoothly, I liked being able to partition the disk for a dual-boot system before cloning. Only issue was that Windows XP said it wasn't a disk that had been tested with XP. Otherwise worked very well.

They had the parts that I needed,and they make it very easy for you to choose the parts that you need. If they don't have it,it probably wasn't made. Would recommend them to any one who is looking to up grade their computer.

Review.Titre: Disk drive hardware compatible but software restore failed
Review.Contenu: After I looked up the compatible replacements drives for my computer model on the DriveSolutions web site, I chose to upgrade from my existing 500MB 5400RPM to 750MB 7200RPM.  I received the drive quickly and installed it with no problems.  However, when I attempted to restore the system software from the SONY supplied DVD, Windows start up failed.  The new drive had 4K physical sectors with 512 logical and the old had 512 physical.  I was unaware of the issue until I tried the restore.  DriveSolutions has a problem with the compatibility tables for SONY VAIO.  SONY has a problem with restore software.  I was able to install a bare Windows and downloaded the drivers from SONY, one by one.

I would recommend this company to anyone who needs a computer part but not in a hurry. Everything was great except for the delivery. It took forever. I didn't need it right away so it wasn't a big deal for me.

The website failed to mention after I selected my brand of PC (Dell XPS 8300) that my BIOS cannot utilize more than 2 TB (not even via separate partitions.. believe me. I spent hours trying various methods) on the hard disk from which it boots. Luckily my 1 TB hard drive still works, so now the 4 TB hard disk I ordered from this website is serving as storage for photos/videos, backups, and whatever else I need to move there later (and can use the full 4TB because I'm not booting from it). This is unfortunate because my intention was for the 4 TB one I ordered from this website to become my primary hard disk and for my old 1 TB to only be used for important backups. Oh well. Overall I am still satisfied.

Review.Titre: On time and correct at a reasonable cost.
Review.Contenu: The SSD and Transfer equipment arrived on time and worked perfectly.It made the installation of the SSD into my HP 110 mini N270 easy and relatively quick. I then upgraded to Windows 10, all in a afternoon.
Reasonable price, quick shipment, & hard drive appears to be running well.Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that nothing has gone wrong yet so haven't had the opportunity to check out support.

I ordered a Toshiba drive and received a WD. The new drive was a perfect replacement and was already formatted. Completely satisfied. Would have rated 5 stars if I had received the Toshiba drive I ordered.
I search online and l founded it. At this time my order is on the way. One thing is that drivesolution webpage of battery is not working.  I like how they go in details  with what you want to order.

Review.Titre: had what I needed and delivered as promised
Review.Contenu: Needed a older style hard drive to reos ir a laptop.  They hsd it. Got it to me as promised.  Was not as expensive as other places but more than I thought given the age of the laptop.  Very pleased.

I really appreciate the support given to me by Gregory and Drive Solutions.

Review.Titre: I needed a 2 TB drive for an older PC…

The package arrived on Saturday and by 9 PM I had a working and reliable PC so I could teach online on Monday. Everything worked flawlessly. I have relied on drivesolutions in the past for drives, software, and kits to hold drives and have never had one problem.  Excellent company, extremely helpful staff.

Replacing the drive was very easy, and now my laptop is back up and running with a drive that's faster than the original. I'm a very satisfied customer, and am glad to recommend DriveSolutions.

If there is a problem, writing or calling customer services will provide a no-hassle solution usually the same day. Regarding my own personal experience, I ordered an entry-level hard drive and later changed my mind and wanted to replace it with a pro-level drive. I wrote an email requesting how I should proceed. They called me within a couple of hours and provided an answer. It just so happened that they did not have in stock the entry-level hard drive in stock so they UPGRADED the order to a pro-level AT THE SAME PRICE. The amazing aspect of this is they resolved the issue the same day. I only wish that other mail-order companies would learn from this fantastic example of really outstanding service.
